original_text: And David took these words to heart and was much afraid of Achish the king of Gath.
korean_text: 다윗이 이 말을 그의 마음에 두고 가드 왕 아기스를 심히 두려워하여

sentences.original_text: And David took these words to heart
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 다윗은 이 말을 마음에 새겼습니다

sentences.original_text: and was much afraid of Achish the king of Gath
